ygData.subject: Quest information. (NOT SPOILER)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard of a warrior quest to get a pretty good 2HS axe called the Avenger Axe.  Something like 44delay 20 damage.  I have looked everywhere for this
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard of a warrior quest to get a pretty good 2HS axe called the
Avenger Axe. Something like 44delay 20 damage. I have looked everywhere
for this quest and can not seem to find its starting location. If any one
of you has information concerning this quest I would love to hear it. Keep
in mind I am not looking for a solution to this quest, just a starting
point.

Dyvim Kincaid
Warrior of Cazic Thule

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
James Wofford
MCIWorldcom (Metamor)
